body_html: per-op double backprop tests are unnecessary. We only use first-order jacobian vector product functions to compute grads of any order, so as long as first-order is correct it should be all good (assuming autograd code is correct, but we have separate tests for that).
body_text: per-op double backprop tests are unnecessary. We only use first-order jacobian vector product functions to compute grads of any order, so as long as first-order is correct it should be all good (assuming autograd code is correct, but we have separate tests for that).
body: per-op double backprop tests are unnecessary. We only use first-order jacobian vector product functions to compute grads of any order, so as long as first-order is correct it should be all good (assuming autograd code is correct, but we have separate tests for that).
